message: Let's start with a fair share. Accept and we can end the game early.
You're starting strong, but I'm not going to let you get away with that easy split!
You think I'm starting strong? You're the one who's getting 80! I'm not giving up yet.
Time to meet in the middle. Accept and we can move on.
You're trying to get the better end of the deal, but I'm not falling for it this time!
You think you're getting the better end of the deal? You're not even trying to get the majority!
Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to give you a bigger share this time.
You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving in yet. Time to think bigger!
You think I'm desperate? I'm just trying to get a fair deal. I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
It's time to split it down the middle. No more games, let's just divide it evenly.
